div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 89px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;

div.div:
sends
submitHTMLForm()
with Email permission
from HTML-Website
via HTTP-POST

div.div: Alice's (Doichain Node + dApp in send mode)

switch.text: Alice's (Doichain Node + dApp in send mode)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
Application Server
Doichain-dApp
(Send Mode)
REST /login
(params: authToken, userId)

div.div: Before Authentication: aquire userId and authToken from dApp by authenticating via standard username password on REST interface. (AuthToken and userID should safely stored)

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 257px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div: we generate an in the Doichain blockchain public visible NameId by using the privKey of an ECDSA in uppercase letters. This privKey is not used for any cryptographic operations and only used as an publicly visible address in the Namecoin namespace "e/" manner. These namespaces are inherited from the Namecoin blockchain.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 181px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div:
we generate an ECDSA keypair
for creating a signature
of the recipient/sender permission.
(gets stored in the dApp-db)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 173px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div:
we create a signature from (sender_email+recipient_email)
with the privateKey of the recipient

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 173px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div:
we form a SHA256 datahash from the optional data given from the application server.
we want to proof its consistency
for later use e.g. in legal actions

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 173px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div:
Gather the publicKey
of the responsible Doichain node for confirming and requesting the double-opt-in email from the TXT field of the DNS of the recipients domain. If not configured we use the public key of a official fallback node

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 173px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div:
with the gathered publicKey
we generate the Doichain address we'll send this data-entry a transaction (peer2eer via blockchain)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 173px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div: we ecies encrypt the URL of the Email template for the DOI-Request with the publickey of the recipient.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 173px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div:
name_doi is a RPC command of which inserts a value directly into Doichain. Also we send 0.01 doi to destAddress so Bob can pay for the confirmation in the blockchain
we adapted former name_new, name_firstupdate, name_update

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;

div.div: stored in the local dApp db

switch.text: stored in the local dApp db

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 270px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
Doichain Node
Listen for unconfirmend
incoming transactions

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 173px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div:
Take our Doichain-Address in order to create the signature
from our name_id ("e/")
This signature will be used as query param in for requeseting the email template from Bob!
We make sure that only the authorized (Erika) can reqeust template and data for this name_id

div.b: we get the opt-in from the local db

switch.text: we get the opt-in from the local db

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 108px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 140px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div: doi request email is sent to alice with the template which is right now defined by the node in sendMode.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 181px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div: Alice's customer could be an internet user taking part in online promotion or registering for a newsletter on Alice internet shop.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 211px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div:
Alice could be a internet shop owner asking for permission to send promotion emails to Alice.
Bob could also be a sort of email marketing agency gathering valid, legal and DOI confirmed email addresses.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 82px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 297px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div:
Bob is hosting the mail server (SMTP/POP3/IMAP4) of Alice's customer and runs a Doichain Node+dApp in "Confirmation Mode" for sending out and confirming the incoming email permission requests ("doi's) in the blockchain.
In case Alice's customer mail provider didn't install Doichain yet Bob is a acting as fallback node of Doichain.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 86px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 26px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap;
div.div: Doichain UML-Activity v0.0.4 by Nico Krause, nico@doichain.org

switch.text: Doichain UML-Activity v0.0.4 by Nico Krause, nico@doichain.org

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
